title: Scarlett Moffatt admits she and new boyfriend sleep in separate rooms because she snores

Scarlett Moffatt showed off the guest bedroom that she sleeps in to avoid tormenting her boyfriend with snores.

The 29-year-old gave her two million followers an insight into what life is like living with her other half when she revealed they are forced to sleep apart.

Geordie lass Scarlett moved in with her policeman boyfriend Scott Dobinson earlier this month after just under a year of dating.

The former Queen of the Jungle said: "Hi I'm Scarlett Moffatt and welcome to my crib.

"Here is the guest bedroom also known as the bedroom I sleep in when Scott is on nights because I snore."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

She continued: "I don't like to keep him awake when I know he needs a decent sleep, so I try and be thoughtful.

"It's got an animal-themed giraffe, an animal-themed wall, a little Toby tiger, and the piece de resistance of this room is the black plush velvet bed.

"It's so comfy. It's got two draws so that it looks like the room's tidy when it's not."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

Her separate room boasted an impressive wall of animal artwork and matching themed bedding.

Scarlett then jumped on the bed to end the video, which is in collaboration with Wowcher.

(Image: Instagram)

The Gogglebox star publicly revealed her romance with Scott back in March this year, and by that time they had already been together for a few months.

But she revealed to the Mirror Online about how happy she is to move in with her boyfriend: "It's so new we are still laughing and smiling about it.

"I think he's the one but I feel, whenever I say that in public, I doom my life!"
description: The Geordie TV personality showed off what life is really like while living with new man Scott
